description: Ola Electric, which made its stock market debut about two months ago, sold 23,965 vehicles in September, recording a month-on-month decline for the second consecutive month.
title: Ola Electric's Dominance Fades as Country's E-Scooter Battle Intensifies

description: Final Fantasy XVI released exclusively on the PS5 in 2023, and the game finally made it to PC last month. The action-RPG is still not available on Xbox, with no confirmed launch plans on Microsoft’s console. Now, publisher Square Enix has provided an update over Final Fantasy 16’s potential release on Xbox Series S/X.
title: Square Enix Wants to Release Final Fantasy 16 on Xbox After PC Port

description: Google Lens is getting a significant update and will now support video recording. Users can use this feature to capture videos about objects and places they would like to run a quick web search about. The feature was first unveiled at Google I/O earlier this year, and it uses the capabilities of the company’s in-house artificial intelligence model, Gemini.
title: Google Lens Gets Upgraded With New Video Feature That Utilises AI Overviews to Generate Responses

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival sale has entered its fifth day for all users in India. It brings discounts on products across a wide range of categories such as smartphones, wearables, laptops and PCs, electronics, home appliances, and more. In addition to buying gadgets, the sale also offers a great avenue for purchasing new storage devices. It brings price drops, coupon discounts and other offers on storage devices such as solid-state drives (SSDs), hard disk drives (HDDs) and USB drives.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale: Best Deals on SSD and Other Storage Devices

description: Vivo X200 series will be unveiled in China on October 14. Just days ahead of the official launch, renders of these smartphones have appeared on a Chinese retailer site. The Vivo X200 and Vivo X200 Pro appear to be available in identical colour options, whereas the Vivo X200 Pro Mini could be launched in different shades. The listing suggests that reservations for the phones will open in China on October 8.
title: Vivo X200, Vivo X200 Pro, Vivo X200 Pro Mini Design Leaked via Retailer Listing Just Days Before Launch

description: Pos Indonesia, the country's state-owned postal service, has integrated NFTs with its stamps in a move to bridge traditional collectibles with cutting-edge blockchain technology. This initiative aims to modernize stamps by blending them with the rapidly growing digital asset space.
title: Indonesia’s State-Owned Postal Service Launches NFT-Linked Stamps Amid Market Slump

description: Honor is developing a new foldable technology that could lead to a device with a multi-directional folding displays. According to a new patent document a device built with this multi-directional folding screen would provide the benefits of a compact clamshell-style foldable, while also delivering a larger screen when needed, just like a book-style folding phone.
title: Honor Patent Application Hints at Device With Multi-Directional Foldable Screen

description: A recent fire at Tata Group's Apple iPhone component plant in southern India has caused an indefinite production halt at Tata's Hosur plant in Tamil Nadu, the only Indian supplier of iPhone back panels and some other parts for both contract manufacturer Foxconn in the country and its own iPhone assembly at another plant.
title: Apple Said to Face Possibility of Relying on China After Tata Plant Fire

description: Motorola has launched its ThinkPhone 25 in select global markets. The latest business edition phone comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC under the hood and is offered in a single 8GB RAM + 256GB storage option. It features a 6.36-inch screen and has a triple rear camera unit led by a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-700C primary sensor.
title: ThinkPhone 25 by Motorola With MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC Launched: Specifications

description: If you're a student looking for portable laptops with top-notch performance and good value for money, this year's Amazon Great Indian Festival sale has plenty of options. Top brands including Dell, Acer, HP, and Lenovo are selling budget laptops with touchscreen, premium-looking chassis, backlit keyboard, or stylus support on Amazon.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2024: Best Deals on Budget Laptops for Students

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 sale is currently underway. The sale focused towards the Indian festive season began on September 27 for all users of the platform. The e-commerce giant is offering discounts on a wide range of products including smartphones, tablets, laptops, earphones, smart TVs, and more. Apart from buying new gadgets, the sale is also a good opportunity to build a PC by purchasing discounted PC components.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale: Best Deals on PC Components

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale has brought numerous deals and discounts on various portable speakers. If you want to buy a new portable speaker without significantly impacting your savings, read on for the best deals on portable speakers from JBL, Marshall, Tribit, Sony, Ultimate Ears, Boat, and Portronics.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale: Best Discounts on Portable Speakers Under Rs. 10,000

description: Airtel allows customers to unlock the PUK code using different methods. One can use methods like the USSD code, the Airtel website, and more to get information about the Airtel PUK code. Moreover, one can also visit Airtel customer care to learn more details about the Airtel PUK code. Here’s everything you need to know.
title: How to Unlock PUK Code of Your Airtel SIM Using Different Methods?

description: YouTube has announced that it is bringing back music by artists such as Adele, Bob Dylan, Kendrick Lamar and others for users in the US, days after their removal from the video-streaming platform due to a legal rights dispute. It claims to have reached an agreement with the for-profit performance-rights organisation SESAC.
title: YouTube Bringing Back Songs by Adele, Green Day and Other Artists in the US After SESAC Deal

description: Tecno Spark 30C 5G is all set to launch in India next week. The Transsion holding subsidiary, via a press release, confirmed the arrival of the new Spark series smartphone in the country on Tuesday (October 1). The Tecno Spark 30C 5G is confirmed to come with a 48-megapixel Sony camera and a 120Hz refresh rate display. The handset is already available in select global markets.
title: Tecno Spark 30C 5G Launch Set for October 8, Teased to Feature 48-Megapixel Camera

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 was launched alongside the Galaxy Z Flip 6 this year. Both foldables offered brand-new designs, while the rest of the hardware (except for their processors) remained the same as their respective predecessors. Around the time of the launch, we also got to know of an ‘Ultra’ model of the Galaxy Z Fold 6, which did not see a release at the Unpacked event. Now, a poster for the same device has allegedly surfaced online suggesting its launch date.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 Ultra Could Launch on October 25, Pre-Orders Said to Go Live on October 18

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale is offering discounts on several consumer electronics products including Wi-Fi routers. You can purchase a new Wi-Fi router from brands like D-Link, Asus, Tenda, and TP-Link at much lower prices during the ongoing Great Indian Festival Sale on Amazon.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale: Top Deals on Wi-Fi Routers

description: OpenAI's latest funding round has attracted Japanese telecom company SoftBank's Vision Fund, that will invest $500 million (roughly Rs. 4,190 crore) in the AI firm. The deal represents SoftBank's first investment in the Sam Altman-led firm.
title: SoftBank to Invest $500 Million in OpenAI: Report

description: Meta is reportedly staying quiet on whether it is collecting video and image data from its artificial intelligence (AI) wearable device Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses to train its large language models (LLMs) or not. The company announced a new real-time video feature for the device using which users can ask the AI to answer queries and ask for suggestions based on their surroundings.
title: Meta Reportedly Refuses to Clarify Whether Videos Captured by Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses Will Remain Private

description: Airtel has partly settled its outstanding spectrum fees from a 2016 auction. This is the first payment the country's second-largest telecom operator is making for the phone spectrum it acquired for $2.13 billion (roughly Rs. 17,852 crore) in 2016.
title: Bharti Airtel Pays $1 Billion to Partly Clear 2016 Spectrum Dues

description: In honor of National Cyber Security Awareness Month this October, crypto investment platform Mudrex announced it will host a series of weekly panel discussions centered on crypto safety and cybersecurity. These sessions will be streamed across its LinkedIn, Instagram, Telegram, YouTube, and X platforms.
title: ‘Secure Your Crypto’: Mudrex Announces VDA-Focused Awareness Initiative in India

description: Guerrilla Games is gearing up to launch Lego Horizon Adventures, a Lego-themed reimagining of Horizon Forbidden West. The studio will also launch Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered later this month. But it might be much longer before we get a mainline Horizon title. Guerrilla Games’ next major project is reportedly a multiplayer Horizon online title.
title: Horizon Online Game Is Reportedly Guerrilla Games' Next Major Project

description: Qualcomm is reportedly developing the successors to the Snapdragon X Elite processors for Windows computers. The purported Arm-based Snapdragon X2 Elite chips are being developed under the codename 'Project Glymur', according to a report. Qualcomm is also developing a new Snapdragon X Plus chipset that could be its cheapest model to date.
title: Qualcomm Developing Snapdragon X Elite Successor Under 'Project Glymur' Codename: Report

description: In one of his first public statements posted on X following his release from US custody, Changpeng Zhao hinted that he is looking to fund projects related to blockchain, decentralised technologies, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and biotech.
title: Binance Former Chief Changpeng Zhao Commits to Blockchain Funding Following Release from US Custody

description: Perplexity, the company behind the eponymous artificial intelligence (AI) search platform, is launching a native Mac app this month. A landing page of the app has appeared on the Mac App Store, detailing the launch date and all the features users will get to experience with the app. The AI firm is also letting users subscribe to Perplexity Pro, the paid subscription tier of the app, via iTunes.
title: Perplexity AI to Introduce Native Mac App With AI-Powered Search, Available for Pre-Order

description: Researchers have found a 3,775-year-old log buried under a farm in Canada, offering insight into a low-cost and scalable method to lock carbon out of the atmosphere for millennia. The study reveals that burying wood under the right conditions, such as in oxygen-deprived environments and clay soils, could prevent its decay and preserve its carbon content. This method, which could sequester up to 10 billion tons of CO2 annually, provides a viable and simple alternative to expensive carbon capture technologies in the fight against climate change.
title: Burying Wood: A Simple, Low-Tech Carbon Storage Solution to Combat Climate Change

description: Researchers have uncovered a remarkable geological phenomenon beneath Türkiye’s Central Anatolian Plateau, where dense materials from Earth’s crust are detaching and sinking into the mantle below. This process, known as multi-stage lithospheric dripping, has been shaping the Konya Basin’s surface and provides crucial insights into Earth’s tectonic activity. The findings not only deepen our understanding of tectonic processes but also offer potential applications for studying planetary geology on Mars and Venus.
title: Earth's Crust is ‘Dripping’ Beneath Turkey’s Konya Basin, Revealing Unique Geological Phenomenon

description: Skygazers in Bengaluru are in for a treat this October 2024, as Comet C/2023 A3 (Tsuchinshan–ATLAS) graces the morning sky in the first few days of the month. The comet, first discovered in early 2023, is travelling through the solar system after passing near the sun in late September. In mid-October, it will shift to the western skies and become visible after sunset, where it will reach its closest point to Earth and may even be seen without telescopic aid."
title: How to See Rare Comet C/2023 A3 Over Bengaluru in October 2024?

description: The annular solar eclipse on October 2, 2024, will see the moon’s shadow move at vastly different speeds across the Southern Hemisphere. While the shadow will reach lightning-fast speeds over 10 million km/h in some areas, it will slow to around 2,057 km/h in others. The speed variation is due to factors like Earth’s curvature and the distance between the moon and the planet. Here’s how fast it will travel and where you can experience the eclipse’s slowest and fastest moments.
title: How Fast Will the Moon's Shadow Travel During the Annular Solar Eclipse on October 2?

description: Liquid AI, a Massachusetts-based artificial intelligence (AI) startup, announced its first generative AI models not built on the existing transformer architecture. Dubbed Liquid Foundation Model (LFM), the new architecture moves away from Generative Pre-trained Transformers (GPTs) which is the foundation for popular AI models such as the GPT series by OpenAI, Gemini, Copilot, and more. The startup claims that the new AI models were built from first principles.
title: Liquid AI Announces Generative AI Liquid Foundation Models With Smaller Memory Footprint

description: Moto G75 5G was launched in select international markets as the latest 5G offering from the Lenovo-owned brand. The new G series phone by Motorola runs on Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 chipset with 8GB RAM. The Moto G75 5G has a MIL-STD 810H-rated build and an IP68 rating. The screen has Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection as well. The handset features a 6.78-inch display with 120Hz refresh rate and 50-megapixel dual rear cameras.
title: Moto G75 5G With Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 SoC, IP68 Rating Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Snapchat has begun rolling out a new feature for iOS users which lets them keep track of all the places they have explored and sent snaps from. The feature, dubbed Footsteps, only works when the Ghost Mode is not enabled on Snapchat for iPhone. In addition to counting new places the user travels to, it can also leverage stored Memories to take past trips into account.
title: Snapchat Rolls Out Footsteps Feature for iOS That Lets Users Track Explored Locations

description: PlayStation Network services are down across all platforms, preventing players from accessing PSN features, PlayStation Store and several games. Affected users can’t sign in to their PSN account or go online. PlayStation Plus services are down, as well.
title: PlayStation Network Services Suffer Massive Outage, Removing Access to PlayStation Store and Games

description: Pixel 9a is now expected to join the Pixel 9 family as a new mid-range addition. Ahead of any official confirmation, a set of computer-aided design (CAD) renders of the Pixel 8a successor have surfaced online. They showcase a staggering change to its rear panel. The Pixel 9a is expected to ship with Android 15 and Tensor G4 processor.
title: Pixel 9a Leaked Renders Suggest Flush Rear Camera Module Instead of Iconic Visor

description: Samsung debuted Galaxy AI for its devices with the Galaxy S24 series in January. At the time, the South Korean technology conglomerate mentioned in the footnotes of its press release that some of its introduced AI features would be free to use until the end of 2025, casting a shadow of doubt over their future availability. With the introduction of the Galaxy S24 FE, Samsung has again reiterated that it may apply fees to some features by the end of next year.
title: Samsung Might Make Certain Galaxy AI Features for Smartphones Paid by the End of 2025: Report

description: Android 16 could be released earlier than usual in 2025, as indicated by information found in the company's documentation. The latest Pixel smartphones have not yet been updated to the latest operating system, even though Google released the source code for Android 15 last month. Meanwhile, Google is reportedly resetting the alphabetical internal codenames for Android 15 and Android 16.
title: Android 16 Might Be Released in Q2 2025 With 'Baklava' Codename: Reports
